comments: Write 1,2,3,4,... in a hexagonal spiral around 0, then a(n) is the sequence found by reading the line from 0 in the direction 0,2,... - _Floor van Lamoen_, Jul 21 2001. The spiral begins:......16..15..14....17..5...4...13..18..6...0...3...1219..7...1...2...11..26..20..8...9...10..25....21..22..23..24Starting with offset 1 = binomial transform of [2, 8, 6, 0, 0, 0,...].
